# Authentication

Note: section left in as an example

# Login

You can use this API to login the application with your account.

# Endpoint

POST /auth/login

# Parameters

Name Type Description Required
username string username ✔️
phone string phone ➖
password string password ✔️

# Response

Status: 200

{
  "username": "username",
  "email": "email"
}

curl -X POST http://api.example.com/auth/login \
  --data '{
    "username": "my-username",
    "password": "my-password"
  }'

# Signup

You can use this API to signup the application with your account.

# Endpoint

POST /auth/signup

# Parameters

Name Type Description Required
username string username ✔️
phone string phone ✔️
password string password ✔️

# Response

Status: 200

{
  "username": "username",
  "email": "email"
}

curl -X POST http://api.example.com/api/auth/login \
  --data '{
    "username": "my-username",
    "password": "my-password"
  }'
